title: Request a Campus Security Escort
description: A student studying late at the library wants a security escort to walk them back to their dorm.

tasks.description: Gather the student's name, current location (library), and destination (dorm building).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary logistical information.

tasks.description: Dispatch a student safety patrol member or a security officer to the student's location.
Provide the student with an estimated arrival time for the escort.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent informs the student that the escort will arrive in 5-10 minutes.
